Name: Forest Dash
About the game: Escape the wrath of the forest in this fast paced platformer! It's tough being a treasure hunter, especially when you run afoul of the curse of the forest. Run, jump, and Slash your way through the obstacles that stand in your way, all the while being chased by the ominous Wall of Death. A moment's hesitation or a single mistake can quickly mean death, so stay on your toes if you want to escape with your prize! • Randomized Levels mean you never play the same game twice • Play through Story Mode to experience the fate of the Treasure Hunter. • 3 unique levels and biomes with obstacles to surmount • See how far you can go in Endless Mode
